conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway conversion with clear wall geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation; walls have clear thickness and height. Projections are consistent across the model.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Very high fidelity to the source plan. Room adjacencies (Master, Theatre, Living) are perfectly maintained. Garage and Alfresco are correctly positioned.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen island, living room sofas, and beds are accurately placed. Bathroom fixtures are present.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting. No text contamination. Minor loss of detail in narrow hallway openings.

detected_errors.description: Some internal door openings are slightly narrow or simplified compared to the plan's swing paths.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D isometric conversion that faithfully replicates the complex layout of the 2D floor plan with excellent structural integrity.
